name: All About You
description:
Based on 1940s NYC, private investigator Hank Artisan sets out on a mission to uncover the secrets of a famous singer Noris Night. 

This was a team project built in 3 weeks, inspired from the song, "It Had To Be You."

Controls

Click/Touch on....
- Hank - Open journal
- Journal - Turn page
- An object - Interact with it
- Any area - Move Hank to that spot
